Appearance

WARESTWhatsApp REST API Unofficial — Build on NodeJS

Multi-device and multi-session WhatsApp automation

⚡ Get Started
Explore the API

Multi-session registry

Bootstrap, reconnect, and monitor unlimited sessions/devices with QR or pair-code plus webhook configs per session.

Full messaging surface

One REST contract for text, media/files/audio/doc/sticker/GIF, location, button/list, poll, reactions, edits, revoke, mute, pin, and more.

Webhooks & automations

HMAC-SHA2 signatures, retries with backoff+jitter, preflight verify, action-in-response, and media mirroring to keep flows reactive.

Storage & media pipeline

Local AES-256-GCM or S3-compatible drivers with signed URLs, presign, optional compression, and large payload handling.

Guardrails built-in

Rate-limiters, anti-spam windows, queue concurrency/retry controls, proxy pool, and health/readiness endpoints for safe ops.

Integration ready

UI dashboard + OpenAPI docs, CLI migrations, Docker images, and official n8n node accelerate development and deployment.

WARNING

WAREST tidak berafiliasi dengan WhatsApp/Facebook/Meta. Gunakan secara bertanggung jawab agar akun tidak terkena suspensi.
